basic.color: Leaf color green , bract red, flower color yellow green

maintenance.soil: Loose, fertile, and well-drained loam soil
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Require a lot fertilization, apply fertilizers 2-3 times each month in spring and summer
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
